mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, B.nickNM, C.img_addr FROM post_table A INNER JOIN user_table B ON A.iuser=B.iuser LEFT JOIN post_img C ON A.iboard=C.iboard WHERE A.iuser=${iuser})D GROUP BY D.iboard ORDER BY D.iboard desc LIMIT ${startPage},9
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(iboard)/${limit}) FROM post_table WHERE iuser=${iuser};
